description: The Aqueduct Floods Hazard Maps for coastal floods were produced using the GLOFRIS model, based on the Global Tide and Surge Reanalysis (GTSR) dataset and sea-level rise projections from the RISES-AM project. The resulting flood maps have a resolution of 30''x30''.
